name: Delay the end
description:
A simple clicker game, where you need to try to save the Earth.

This is a project created for the Ludum Dare Jam 50, is based on the topic Delay the Inevitable, you need to collect money to try to resolve the problems that the Earth have before the planet will be destroyed.

Are you capable to delay the inevitable?

How to play?

The source code

You can get the code of the game directly from github.

Let in the comment your record!!!
